      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.List<Coord> path
      The list the holds the coordinates of the squares between the source piece and the target piece (normally used in checkmate rules)

      • isVerticalOrHorizontalMove

        public static boolean isVerticalOrHorizontalMove​(int x,
                                                 int y,
                                                 int targetX,
                                                 int targetY,
                                                 Piece[][] board,
                                                 boolean tracePath)
        Method that determines if move is horizontal or vertical
        Parameters:
        x - The row position of the source piece
        y - The column position of the source piece
        targetX - The row position of the target piece
        targetY - The column position of the target piece
        board - The 2D array that holds the chess board and all pieces
        tracePath - Flag used to determine if squares in between should be traced
        Returns:
        true|false
